sentences.sentence: Enforceability----Property rights should be secure from involuntary seizure or encroachment from others.
sentences.translation: 执行力——产权应该从无意扣押或他人侵犯中握牢。

sentences.sentence: The enforceability of such provision shall otherwise be unaffected and remain enforceable in all other jurisdictions.
sentences.translation: 这种规定的可执行性，否则不会受到影响，并保持在所有其他司法管辖区执行。

sentences.sentence: Netting may take several forms which have varying degrees of legal enforceability in the event of default of one of the parties.
sentences.translation: 轧差可采用不同的方式进行，这些方式在一方丧失清偿能力的情况下，其法律强制轧差的程度不尽相同。
